title: Drawing, 1993-121-65
medium: Pencil and pastel on cream wove textured watercolor paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in left margin, at upper left:  carry?/dark; at center:  carry?/dark; in right margin, upper right:  more/white; center: more white; lower right:  carry dark.  Scale marked along right edge of drawing; inscribed 4 times, along lower right:  5"; at bottom margin:  3".  Inscribed in chalk and graphite, lower margin left:  32/5  ok/ 2/5  [unreadable word]; in lower margin, middle:  2/SL [?] 2; at lower right:  1/2 W/ Rug/ "First Snow"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Vertical design with horizontal lines, contained in rectangular boxes, asymetrically spaced on surface.  Fringes of rug indicated at top and bottom.
